Package Project

Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Project.Animal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Colourful
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fish, Shark, Water
    public abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Colourful
    Animal is an abstract Superclass for animals. It manages the characteristic and behaviours the all animals have in common.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Marc Giger
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
